home.title: Home
home.noInstances:
No instances available
It seems you don`t have any instances at the moment

settings.title: Settings
settings.systemColorModeDescription:
Automatically adapt to your system's color mode.
This option is applied only when the color theme is set to "System"
settings.checkForUpdatesDescription:
An updated version of the application is now available!
It will restart automatically after installation.
settings.actionOnInstanceLaunchDescription:
Select an action to perform when launching an instance.
 "Do nothing" will not hide the launcher on launch.
 "Hide"  hide launcher window.
 "Close" will close the launcher window but will not close application (saves memory).

instance.removeTitle: Are you sure you want to delete instance {{name}}?
instance.removeDescription: If you proceed, all data for your instance will be permanently erased, including your worlds. You will not be able to recover it.

createInstance.title: Create instance
createInstance.loaderVersionNoGameVersion: Select a game version before you select a loader version

createOfflineAccount.title: Create offline account
createOfflineAccount.usernameError: The username must contain only English letters, numbers and underscores
